scripts.test: docker compose -f "test/docker/docker-compose.yml" -f "test/docker/docker-compose.override.yml" -p docker-test up -d && echo "Waiting 30s for the container to up..." && sleep 30 && docker exec -it {{DOCKER_DB_CONTAINER_NAME}}.test bash -c "/db-migration.sh" && dotnet test && docker compose -p docker-test down && docker volume rm docker-test_{{DOCKER_DB_CONTAINER_NAME}}.test.dbdata
